medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has experienced several weeks of low-grade abdominal pain without nausea or vomiting, and low-grade fevers since discharge after brain resection. On three days prior to the visit, she experienced acute worsening of her abdominal pain, fever, nausea, vomiting, and inability to tolerate PO. She also endorses diarrhea today.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Metastatic lung cancer s/p resection brain met and cyberknife, anxiety, history of ectopic pregnancy, lumbar disc hernia, PID
